title: SET_ENTITY_REMOTE_SYNCED_SCENES_ALLOWED
content:
0xD3FC9D88// SetEntityRemoteSyncedScenesAllowed
void SET_ENTITY_REMOTE_SYNCED_SCENES_ALLOWED(Entity entity, bool allow);Parameters:entity: The entity to set the flag for.allow: Whether to allow remote synced scenes for the entity.Enables or disables the owner check for the specified entity in network-synchronized scenes. When set to false, the entity cannot participate in synced scenes initiated by clients that do not own the entity.By default, this is false for all entities, meaning only the entity's owner can include it in networked synchronized scenes.
codeBlocks:
local entity = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for SET_ENTITY_REMOTE_SYNCED_SCENES_ALLOWED
SetEntityRemoteSyncedScenesAllowed(entity, false)
